title: Midnight Goes Live As Cardano Founder Targets A $10 Billion Ecosystem
body: Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson has declared Midnight officially launched, describing it as the ‚Äúfirst fourth generation cryptocurrency‚Äù and claiming it has already become ‚Äúa billion dollar ecosystem heading to a $10 billion ecosystem.‚Äù In a December 9 livestream from Colorado, recorded after he was forced to cancel an appearance at Abu Dhabi Finance Week due to severe food poisoning and a jet malfunction, Hoskinson framed the launch as both a technical milestone and an ideological statement about how cryptocurrencies should be built and distributed. Cardano Founder Touts Midnight‚Äôs Fair Launch Despite saying he had ‚Äúnot eaten in two days‚Äù and was ‚Äúa little faded,‚Äù the Cardano founder focused on the scale and duration of the effort behind Midnight. ‚ÄúWe worked on it for six years,‚Äù he said, noting ‚Äúmany false starts‚Äù and several technology changes before the team converged on ‚Äúa roadmap and a technology stack that we feel is going to be the tech stack of the future.‚Äù Midnight‚Äôs rollout, he stressed, is structured in four phases, with the project now ‚Äúin the very first phase‚Äù of that plan. The next stage, according to the Cardan founder, will significantly expand Midnight‚Äôs capabilities. Over the coming months, the team intends to bring up a federated mainnet and an incentivized testnet, then activate ‚Äúhybrid DApps with each ecosystem.‚Äù He said ‚Äúthe next nine months is going to be a lot of fun‚Äù but also ‚Äúa lot of work for all of us,‚Äù pointing to features such as ‚Äútrue hybrid applications, true multi-resource consensus, [and] true post-quantum folding schemes‚Äù that aim to ‚Äúadvance the state-of-the-art of all of the zero knowledge stacks.‚Äù The overarching goal, he argued, is ‚Äúcreating a natural easy way for people [to] get their privacy back.‚Äù Privacy and chain-agnostic interoperability are at the core of how Hoskinson positioned Midnight. He said users are ‚Äústarting to realize and starting to wake up that their privacy is not a guarantee and it‚Äôs not a given,‚Äù and criticized existing systems as ‚Äúdesigned from the ground up to take your privacy from you.‚Äù Midnight, by contrast, is framed as infrastructure that can be used by ‚Äúevery single blockchain in the space.‚Äù ‚ÄúWhat makes Midnight so special is the fact that Midnight is for everyone,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt has equal application to Solana users and Avalanche users and Ethereum users and Binance users and Cardano users and Bitcoin users and everyone else in between.‚Äù The Cardano repeatedly emphasized distribution and launch mechanics as a deliberate rejection of the venture-driven model that dominates much of the industry. He highlighted that Midnight was brought to market ‚Äúin a completely decentralized way‚Äù with ‚Äúno ICO, no insiders, no VC participation.‚Äù The outcome, in his view, is that ‚Äúevery single user enjoys the fact that it had a fair launch and a fair distribution and every single person was on equal footing through the Glacier Drop , the Scavenger Hunt, and now the exchange distributions.‚Äù On that basis, he argued that ‚Äúit‚Äôs still possible in 2025 to launch a cryptocurrency the way Satoshi did it‚Äù and ‚Äústill possible to build something with vision and values where we can do better and not hand the world over to centralized actors, the finance of old.‚Äù Hoskinson Warns Of Regulatory Overreach He also used the Midnight launch to issue a broader warning about regulation and the direction of the industry if privacy-preserving infrastructure is not defended. ‚ÄúRight now the laws are being written. They‚Äôre written the wrong way,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIf the rulemaking is done the wrong way, every single thing that makes cryptocurrency special will be taken from us.‚Äù Hoskinson rejected a future where ‚Äúonly custodial wallets‚Äù exist, ‚Äúevery single person has to be KYC and AML ,‚Äù and ‚Äúonly five or 10 protocols are pre-selected‚Äù and ‚Äúarmchair controlled by a small cabal of international bankers.‚Äù Instead, he said, ‚ÄúI want to live in a world where the protocols preserve and protect your rights as a human, your agency as a human, your economic identity as a human.‚Äù Hoskinson described Midnight as ‚Äúprobably the fastest growing and most vocal project we‚Äôve ever built,‚Äù pointing to ‚Äúhundreds of ambassadors‚Äù coming online and a rapidly filling Discord, which he framed as a gathering point for those who believe in ‚Äúfreedom of association, commerce, and expression.‚Äù He ended with a direct call to action: ‚ÄúI want you to join the Discord. I want you to become an ambassador and tell each and every person that we can do better. And I want you to build on Midnight.‚Äù Whatever network developers come from, he said, ‚Äújust build something and show the world that you can do interesting and cool things,‚Äù adding that for him and his team, ‚Äúwe‚Äôre in it for life.‚Äù At press time, Cardano traded at $0.4621.
tags: Cardano|ADA|ADA news|ADA Price|Cardano news|Cardano Price|Charles Hoskinson|Midnight|NIGHT

title: Singapore Dominates Global Crypto Adoption: 2025 Report Reveals Stunning Leadership
body: BitcoinWorld Singapore Dominates Global Crypto Adoption: 2025 Report Reveals Stunning Leadership Imagine a nation where digital currency isn‚Äôt just an investment but part of daily life. According to the groundbreaking 2025 Global Crypto Ranking Report by Bybit and DL Research, that nation is Singapore, which has seized the top spot in global crypto adoption . Surpassing 78 other countries, this city-state demonstrates what happens when clear regulation meets technological ambition. Why Does Singapore Lead in Crypto Adoption? The report analyzed 79 nations, ranking them on factors like regulatory clarity, public interest, and institutional participation. Singapore claimed first place, followed by the United States, Lithuania, Switzerland, and the UAE. This leadership isn‚Äôt accidental. Singapore‚Äôs government has actively cultivated a pro-innovation environment while implementing robust consumer protection frameworks. This balance gives businesses and individuals the confidence to engage deeply with digital assets. What‚Äôs Fueling This Massive Growth? Beyond the ranking, the report reveals powerful trends making crypto adoption tangible. The market for Real-World Asset (RWA) tokenization‚Äîwhere physical assets like real estate or commodities are represented on a blockchain‚Äîexploded by 63% to reach $2.57 billion. This isn‚Äôt niche tech; it‚Äôs a fundamental shift in how we own and trade value. Furthermore, the rise of national stablecoins is staggering. Projects issuing digital currencies backed by sovereign fiat, like the Singapore Dollar, are growing rapidly. They provide a stable bridge between traditional finance and the crypto world. How Is Crypto Changing Everyday Work? The most relatable sign of crypto adoption might be your paycheck. The report found that on-chain salary payments now account for 9.6% of all payroll transactions. Over 90% of these payments are settled using stablecoins, offering employees speed, lower fees, and borderless receipt of funds. Consider the benefits: Instant Settlement: No more waiting days for bank transfers. Reduced Costs: Minimizes intermediary banking fees. Financial Inclusion: Provides banking services to the unbanked via a smartphone. What Challenges Lie Ahead for Global Adoption? Singapore‚Äôs success provides a blueprint, but challenges remain for worldwide crypto adoption . Regulatory fragmentation across different countries creates complexity for global businesses. Security concerns and the need for greater public education are also persistent hurdles. However, the trends in RWA tokenization and stablecoin use show the technology is moving beyond speculation to solve real-world problems in finance and logistics. What Can We Learn from Singapore‚Äôs Model? Singapore‚Äôs top ranking offers actionable insights. First, clear and proactive regulation attracts investment instead of stifling it. Second, integrating crypto with existing financial systems, as seen with stablecoins, encourages mainstream use. Finally, focusing on utility‚Äîlike paying salaries or tokenizing assets‚Äîproves that cryptocurrency‚Äôs value extends far beyond trading charts. In conclusion, the 2025 report paints a clear picture: crypto adoption is accelerating, driven by pragmatic use cases and pioneering nations. Singapore leads by showing that the future of finance is a blend of innovation and intelligent oversight. This isn‚Äôt just about buying Bitcoin; it‚Äôs about building a more efficient, inclusive, and transparent global economy. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What does ‚Äòcrypto adoption‚Äô mean in this report? In this context, crypto adoption refers to how deeply cryptocurrency and blockchain technology are integrated into a country‚Äôs economy and daily life. The ranking considers factors like regulatory support, public participation, and commercial use cases like payroll and asset tokenization. Why is Real-World Asset (RWA) tokenization important? RWA tokenization turns physical assets (e.g., property, art, commodities) into digital tokens on a blockchain. This makes them easier to divide, trade, and manage, increasing liquidity and opening investment opportunities to more people. Its 63% growth signals a major shift toward practical blockchain utility. Are stablecoins safe for receiving salaries? Stablecoins designed for payroll are typically backed 1:1 by fiat currency held in reserves, making them less volatile than cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. When issued by reputable, regulated projects, they offer a fast and cost-effective way to receive payments, especially across borders. Could other countries replicate Singapore‚Äôs success? Yes, but it requires a balanced approach. Singapore combined welcoming regulations for innovation with strong consumer protection laws. Other nations need to create similar legal clarity and foster partnerships between traditional finance and crypto firms to boost adoption. What is the biggest barrier to global crypto adoption? Inconsistent and unclear regulations across different countries remain a significant barrier. This creates uncertainty for businesses and users. Increasing public education to demystify crypto technology and its benefits is also crucial for wider acceptance. How does on-chain salary payment work? Instead of a traditional bank transfer, an employer sends payment in stablecoins directly to an employee‚Äôs digital wallet address on a blockchain. The transaction is recorded on a public ledger, settling in minutes, and the employee can then hold, convert, or spend the digital currency. Found this insight into Singapore‚Äôs crypto leadership fascinating? Help others stay informed by sharing this article on your social media channels. The future of finance is being written now‚Äîspread the word! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency trends, explore our article on key developments shaping global crypto adoption and institutional investment. This post Singapore Dominates Global Crypto Adoption: 2025 Report Reveals Stunning Leadership first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: What to Expect for XRP Once Ripple Becomes a Bank
body: A recent post from crypto commentator Stellar Rippler draws attention to a regulatory development that could alter how digital assets fit into the U.S. financial system. The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) has indicated that crypto companies seeking federal charters should be assessed on the same basis as traditional banks. This position creates a clear path for Ripple to pursue a National Trust Charter, a step that would meaningfully change how XRP functions within regulated financial infrastructure. OCC Just Quietly Greenlit Ripple‚Äôs Endgame: A Federally Chartered XRP Bank. OCC Comptroller Jonathan Gould: ‚ÄúCrypto firms should be treated like banks when applying for federal charters.‚Äù Read that again. Not ‚Äúmaybe.‚Äù Not ‚Äúsomeday.‚Äù Equal footing with banks. Why this is‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/7rEYOMK3Xn ‚Äî Stellar Rippler (@StellarNews007) December 9, 2025 What A National Trust Charter Would Allow If a Ripple secured such a charter, its role would extend far beyond operating a digital asset platform. A federally chartered trust can perform custody, clearing, and settlement functions under direct federal supervision. This also brings potential access to Federal Reserve payment systems, repo facilities, treasury market infrastructure, and established institutional custody frameworks. Under these conditions, XRP could operate as a regulated settlement asset rather than simply a digital token, enabling more direct integration into established financial systems. The charter would also allow the institution to connect to global liquidity channels without relying on intermediaries. This creates the possibility of building settlement pathways that are more direct, more compliant, and more suitable for institutional use. These changes would shift XRP‚Äôs utility from transactional movement to functioning as part of the underlying infrastructure that supports regulated financial transfers. Operational Changes And Institutional Use Cases With a federal charter, Ripple could facilitate cross-border settlement without the need for correspondent banks. This would reduce the inefficiencies found in nostro-vostro arrangements by enabling settlement through a single regulated institution with access to U.S. payment rails. It also opens the door to managing tokenised treasuries and corporate debt at scale, which requires a regulated framework, institutional-grade custody, and verifiable settlement finality. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Such a setup could allow XRP to serve as a neutral bridge asset in multi-currency clearing environments. Instead of relying on several intermediaries, institutions could settle obligations through one supervised entity capable of handling liquidity, custody, and settlement flows. Regulatory And Institutional Considerations Earning a federal charter would bring significant oversight. Prudential regulation, compliance obligations, and risk management requirements would increase. Institutions considering XRP for settlement would still need to align these activities with internal policies and external regulatory expectations. Even so, the OCC‚Äôs stance establishes a clear and formal route for eligible crypto firms to be treated on equal regulatory footing with banks. Deposits made using other networks will be lost. Please note: Trading via Kraken App and Instant Buy will be available once the liquidity conditions are met (when a sufficient number of buyers and sellers have entered the market for their orders to be efficiently matched). title: Unlock Potential: Binance‚Äôs Strategic NIGHT/USDT Perpetual Futures Launch with 50x Leverage
body: BitcoinWorld Unlock Potential: Binance‚Äôs Strategic NIGHT/USDT Perpetual Futures Launch with 50x Leverage In a significant move for the crypto derivatives market, Binance has announced it will list the NIGHT/USDT perpetual futures contract on December 10th. This launch, featuring support for up to 50x leverage, provides traders with a powerful new instrument to capitalize on NIGHT‚Äôs price movements. Let‚Äôs explore what this means for your trading strategy and the broader market. What Are NIGHT/USDT Perpetual Futures? Perpetual futures, or ‚Äúperps,‚Äù are derivative contracts that allow you to speculate on an asset‚Äôs future price without an expiry date. Unlike traditional futures, you can hold these positions indefinitely, provided you maintain the required margin. The new NIGHT/USDT perpetual futures contract on Binance will let traders go long (betting the price will rise) or short (betting it will fall) on the NIGHT token, using Tether (USDT) as the settlement currency. The key details for the launch are straightforward: Listing Time: December 10, 2024, at 11:00 AM UTC. Leverage: Up to 50x is available, allowing for amplified positions. Ticker: NIGHTUSDT. Settlement: Settled in USDT, simplifying the process for many traders. Why Is This Binance Listing a Game-Changer? Binance‚Äôs decision to list NIGHT/USDT perpetual futures is a major vote of confidence in the token‚Äôs liquidity and market interest. Listings on the world‚Äôs largest crypto exchange typically lead to increased visibility, trading volume, and price discovery for the asset. For traders, this creates fresh opportunities. The availability of 50x leverage means that even small price movements can translate into substantial profits‚Äîhowever, it also magnifies potential losses, making risk management non-negotiable. This launch aligns with a growing trend of major exchanges expanding their derivatives offerings to meet trader demand for sophisticated tools. Therefore, it signals that NIGHT is joining a select group of altcoins with robust futures market support. How Can You Trade These New Futures Safely? While the allure of 50x leverage is powerful, navigating NIGHT/USDT perpetual futures requires a disciplined approach. First, understand the funding rate mechanism, which is a periodic fee exchanged between long and short positions to keep the contract‚Äôs price aligned with the spot market. Secondly, always use stop-loss orders to define your maximum risk before entering a trade. The high leverage means market volatility can quickly trigger liquidations if your position moves against you. Consider these actionable steps before trading: Start Small: Use lower leverage (like 5x or 10x) to get a feel for the contract‚Äôs behavior. Monitor Funding Rates: A highly positive or negative rate can significantly impact the cost of holding a position. Stay Informed: Follow NIGHT‚Äôs project developments and overall market sentiment, as these are key price drivers. What Does This Mean for the Future of NIGHT? The introduction of a NIGHT/USDT perpetual futures market is more than just a new trading pair. It often leads to greater market efficiency and can attract institutional and professional traders seeking hedging capabilities. For the NIGHT ecosystem, this enhanced liquidity and exposure can foster greater stability and investor interest over the long term. However, it also introduces the potential for increased short-term price volatility, especially around the listing time. In summary, Binance‚Äôs launch is a pivotal moment that integrates NIGHT deeper into the global crypto financial system. It provides tools for advanced speculation and risk management, marking the token‚Äôs maturation within the digital asset space. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: When exactly will Binance list the NIGHT/USDT perpetual contract? A1: The listing is scheduled for December 10, 2024, at 11:00 AM Universal Coordinated Time (UTC). Q2: What is the maximum leverage available for this futures contract? A2: Binance will support leverage of up to 50x for the NIGHT/USDT perpetual futures contract. Q3: Do perpetual futures contracts expire? A3: No, that‚Äôs what makes them ‚Äúperpetual.‚Äù They have no expiry date, so you can hold a position indefinitely as long as you meet margin requirements. Q4: What are the main risks of trading with high leverage? A4: The primary risk is liquidation. High leverage amplifies both gains and losses. A small adverse price move can wipe out your margin and close your position automatically. Q5: How is the price of a perpetual futures contract maintained? A5: It‚Äôs primarily maintained through a ‚Äúfunding rate‚Äù‚Äîa periodic payment between long and short traders that incentivizes the contract price to track the underlying spot price. Q6: Can I trade this contract from the United States? A6: No. Binance.com is not available to users in the United States. U.S. residents must use the separate Binance.US platform, which may not offer this product. Ready to dive into the latest crypto trading opportunities? If you found this guide on Binance‚Äôs new futures listing helpful, share it with your network on X (Twitter) or Telegram to help other traders stay informed. Knowledge is power in the fast-moving crypto world! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency derivatives trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the futures market and institutional adoption. This post Unlock Potential: Binance‚Äôs Strategic NIGHT/USDT Perpetual Futures Launch with 50x Leverage first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Critical Czech Koruna Forecast: UBS Issues Stark Warning as Currency Rally Falters
body: BitcoinWorld Critical Czech Koruna Forecast: UBS Issues Stark Warning as Currency Rally Falters In a significant development for forex markets, UBS has revised its Czech koruna forecast as the currency‚Äôs recent rally shows signs of slowing. This adjustment comes at a crucial time for traders monitoring Central European currencies, particularly those with exposure to the CZK exchange rate . The Swiss banking giant‚Äôs updated analysis provides essential insights for cryptocurrency investors who often watch traditional currency movements for broader market signals. Why Did UBS Adjust Its Czech Koruna Forecast? UBS economists have tempered their optimism about the Czech koruna‚Äôs near-term performance after observing several key factors. The bank‚Äôs previous bullish stance has been revised downward due to changing economic conditions both domestically and internationally. This UBS currency analysis highlights how central bank policies, inflation trends, and regional economic developments are converging to create a more challenging environment for the CZK. Three primary factors influenced UBS‚Äôs revised outlook: Slower-than-expected economic growth in the Czech Republic Changing interest rate differentials with the Eurozone Reduced foreign investment inflows into Czech assets Understanding the EUR/CZK Outlook and Market Implications The EUR/CZK outlook has become increasingly important for traders as the currency pair reflects broader economic relationships between the Czech Republic and the Eurozone. UBS‚Äôs analysis suggests that the koruna‚Äôs appreciation against the euro may face headwinds in the coming months, potentially creating trading opportunities for alert investors. The revised Czech koruna forecast from UBS signals broader shifts in forex market trends that cryptocurrency traders should monitor. Currency movements often precede or accompany shifts in risk appetite across financial markets, including digital assets. The koruna‚Äôs performance against major currencies can serve as a barometer for investor sentiment toward emerging European markets. Key implications for traders include: Potential increased volatility in CZK pairs Changed correlation patterns with other risk assets New arbitrage opportunities between traditional and digital assets What Does UBS Currency Analysis Reveal About Regional Stability? UBS‚Äôs detailed UBS currency analysis extends beyond simple exchange rate predictions to assess the fundamental health of the Czech economy. The bank‚Äôs economists examine multiple indicators including trade balances, foreign reserves, and monetary policy effectiveness. Their findings suggest that while the Czech Republic maintains solid economic fundamentals, external pressures are mounting. The analysis particularly emphasizes: Czech National Bank‚Äôs policy trajectory Export competitiveness concerns Regional geopolitical factors affecting currency flows Actionable Insights from the Revised CZK Exchange Rate Forecast For active traders and investors, the updated CZK exchange rate projections offer several actionable insights. Understanding where professional institutions like UBS see currency movements heading can help position portfolios more effectively, whether trading traditional forex pairs or correlated cryptocurrency assets. Consider these strategic approaches: Monitor EUR/CZK for breakout opportunities Watch for spillover effects into cryptocurrency markets Use currency analysis to time broader market entries Frequently Asked Questions What is UBS and why is their currency analysis important? UBS is a leading global financial services company with significant expertise in currency markets. Their analysis is closely watched by institutional and retail traders alike for its depth and accuracy. How does the Czech koruna relate to cryptocurrency markets? While not directly correlated, currency movements often reflect broader risk sentiment that affects all financial markets, including cryptocurrencies. Major currency shifts can influence capital flows into and out of digital assets. What is the Czech National Bank‚Äôs role in the koruna‚Äôs value? The Czech National Bank implements monetary policy that directly affects the koruna‚Äôs exchange rate through interest rate decisions and currency interventions when necessary. How accurate have UBS currency forecasts been historically? UBS maintains a strong track record in currency forecasting, though like all predictions, they are subject to market uncertainties and unexpected economic developments. Where can I find more information about forex market analysis? Financial institutions like International Monetary Fund and World Bank provide regular economic analysis that includes currency outlooks for various countries. Conclusion: Navigating Currency Markets with Professional Insight UBS‚Äôs revised Czech koruna forecast serves as a crucial reminder that currency markets remain dynamic and responsive to changing economic conditions. The slowing koruna rally highlights how quickly forex market trends can shift, requiring constant vigilance from traders and investors. By understanding the factors behind UBS‚Äôs adjusted EUR/CZK outlook , market participants can make more informed decisions across all asset classes, including the increasingly interconnected cryptocurrency markets. title: Gamdom Introduces 100% Return to Player Across All Original Crypto Casino Games
body: San Jos√©, Costa Rica, December 10th, 2025, PlayNewswire All Gamdom Originals Now Operate at 100% Return to Player Gamdom has announced a significant update to its in-house gaming lineup, implementing a 100% Return to Player (RTP) rate across all Gamdom Originals, including titles such as Dice, Mines, Plinko, Keno, Crash, and more. This change effectively removes the house edge from these games. Understanding Return to Player (RTP) RTP refers to the percentage of total wagers a game is designed to pay back to players over time. For example, a game with 97% RTP would return $97 for every $100 wagered, on average. A 100% RTP indicates a zero house edge, positioning the game to return the full wagered amount over time. Gamdom Originals Now Run at 100% RTP All Gamdom Originals now operate with: 100% RTP Zero house edge Full return on every wager Compared to traditional online casino games, which typically maintain a 95‚Äì97% RTP, Gamdom‚Äôs adjustment eliminates the house margin entirely for its original games. Highlights of the Gamdom Originals Lineup Crash ‚Äì A multiplier-based game where players aim to cash out before the increasing multiplier crashes. The 100% RTP setup enhances round-by-round fairness. Dice ‚Äì Players guess whether a number will be higher or lower than a target. Now operating with 100% RTP for increased long-term returns. Mines ‚Äì A tile-reveal game similar to Minesweeper. Players aim to avoid mines and collect payouts. The update increases payout transparency and player value. Plinko ‚Äì Players drop a ball through a pegged board aiming for slots with multipliers up to 1,000x. The 100% RTP setup adds statistical parity to each drop. Roulette ‚Äì A modernized take on the classic casino game, now with a zero-edge RTP framework. Keno ‚Äì Players choose numbers in hopes of matching draws for large multipliers. The 100% RTP model aims to maximize session value. Hi-Lo ‚Äì A fast-paced card game where players guess whether the next card will be higher or lower. The change to 100% RTP removes the house advantage. Technical and User-Focused Enhancements All Gamdom Originals feature: Provably fair algorithms Cryptocurrency-native functionality (BTC, ETH, USDC, and others) Adjustable risk levels and higher potential payouts compared to traditional models This adjustment is positioned to offer users full transparency and higher statistical returns over time in a crypto-native gaming environment. About Gamdom Founded in 2016, Gamdom is a licensed Anjouan operator offering a full spectrum of online entertainment: from slots, in-house games, and live casino tables to a cutting-edge sportsbook and esports markets. With over 16 million registered users, instant crypto withdrawals, and a unique social gaming experience, Gamdom has established itself as one of the most trusted and innovative platforms in the industry. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Bitcoin Nears Breakout as ‚ÄòAfter Dark‚Äô ETF Targets Overnight Gains
body: Bitcoin is drawing attention from both regulators and traders as a proposed ‚Äúafter dark‚Äù ETF targets its overnight gains while the spot price presses into the $92,000‚Äì$94,000 resistance zone. The filing and the chart setup now frame the next move, as markets watch whether Bitcoin can break higher toward $100,000 or slip back toward support. Bitcoin ‚ÄòAfter Dark‚Äô ETF Filing Targets Overnight Price Gains A new filing confirms plans for an exchange-traded fund designed to hold Bitcoin only at night. The proposal, submitted by Tidal Trust II for the Nicholas Bitcoin and Treasuries AfterDark ETF, outlines a strategy that buys Bitcoin exposure at the U.S. market close and sells it shortly after the opening bell. The document says the fund will enter Bitcoin positions around 4 p.m. Eastern time. Then, it will unwind those positions after 9:30 a.m., limiting exposure to the overnight window. During daytime trading hours, the ETF plans to keep assets in short-term U.S. Treasuries, money-market funds and cash equivalents. The issuer cites data showing that much of Bitcoin‚Äôs historical upside has occurred outside regular U.S. stock-market hours. Because of that pattern, the fund aims to capture those overnight moves while avoiding daytime volatility. The filing shows that the strategy remains a proposal and still requires approval from the Securities and Exchange Commission. Bitcoin Tests $92K‚Äì$94K Resistance as Trader Maps Next Levels Bitcoin has returned to a key resistance band between $92,000 and $94,000, according to a chart shared by trader Ted, who posts as @TedPillows on X. The daily chart shows price pressing into that zone after bouncing from support below $90,000. Bitcoin Resistance At 92K To 94K. Source: TedPillows on X In his post, Ted said a clean move above this resistance could open the way for a rally toward $100,000. The chart outlines an upside path with successive higher highs if buyers push through the band and hold above it. However, Ted also warned that a failure at this level would likely send Bitcoin back to retest the $90,000 area. The downside scenario on the chart shows another rejection from resistance followed by a drop toward lower support if sellers regain control.

title: Zcash (ZEC) Price Outlook: How Ztarknet L2 Could Influence Long-Term Demand
body: Zcash (ZEC) enters a pivotal development stage as the community prepares for Ztarknet, a Layer 2 upgrade designed to introduce private smart contracts through STARK proofs. Set for launch in Q1 2026, the upgrade positions Zcash for a broader role in DeFi while maintaining its privacy-first architecture. Communication becomes more effective when it reflects what the market is paying attention to, and Outset PR incorporates this principle into its workflow. The agency follows ongoing developments ‚Äî including upgrades, governance proposals, and shifts in sector focus ‚Äî to understand when a narrative is most likely to resonate. Ztarknet L2 Could Reshape Zcash‚Äôs Role in DeFi Proposed on 6 November 2025, Ztarknet expands Zcash beyond shielded transfers. By enabling private smart contracts, the upgrade could draw developers and users seeking confidential DeFi environments, a niche where Zcash holds clear structural advantages. At the same time, Shielded Labs proposed shifting from fixed fees to median-based dynamic pricing. The change aims to mitigate spam attacks and improve efficiency, though fluctuating costs may initially confuse users accustomed to stable fees. Adoption will largely depend on seamless wallet integration. If interfaces fail to adapt quickly, user friction could slow momentum despite strong underlying technology. ZEC Price Outlook: Uptrend Requires a Confirmed Breakout ZEC rebounded from support near $350 and now tests resistance around $420. The RSI at 46 indicates capacity for further upside, but the MACD remains negative, signaling unfinished recovery. A daily close above $455 ‚Äî the 50-day simple moving average ‚Äî would strengthen bullish structure and open the path toward $500. Until then, ZEC trades in a developing uptrend rather than a fully confirmed reversal. How Outset PR Shapes Crypto Narratives Through Market Awareness Outset PR tracks market developments to build narratives that align with real demand cycles and audience behavior. The agency bases its approach on data rather than broad messaging, ensuring each campaign fits the market moment. Founded by strategist Mike Ermolaev, Outset PR uses its proprietary Outset Data Pulse system to monitor media trendlines and traffic distribution. This intelligence helps determine the best timing, angles, and outlets for coverage, increasing the lift of each message. Another in-house tool, Syndication Map identifies which publications trigger the strongest downstream distribution across platforms such as CoinMarketCap and Binance Square, often multiplying campaign visibility. By merging narrative design with real-time market analysis, Outset PR ensures communication strategies reflect what the market is paying attention to. What‚Äôs Driving ZEC‚Äôs Momentum The latest rally reflects anticipation around Ztarknet, increased partnership activity, and speculative positioning ahead of major upgrades. As Zcash transitions toward a more versatile ecosystem, investor attention has shifted from pure privacy use cases to emerging DeFi opportunities. If Ztarknet delivers functional private smart contracts and user-facing tools catch up, ZEC could see sustained inflows throughout 2026. title: Real Finance gains $29 million fresh funding to power next leg of RWA market push
body: Real Finance has secured $29 million in the latest funding round that included participation from Nimbus Capital, Magnus Capital, and Frekaz Group. The firm aims to use the funds to expand its infrastructure for real-world asset tokenization (RWAs). According to the Real Finance press release, Nimbus Capital contributed approximately $25 million to the funding round, alongside contributions from Magnus Capital and Frekaz Group. The firm noted that the investment will help develop the compliance, settlement, and operational systems required for regulated financial institutions to move traditional financial assets onto blockchain networks. Real Finance targets to tokenize $500 million in RWA in the first year Real Finance, a real-world asset tokenization network, revealed today that it aims to tokenize approximately $500 million in real-world assets in the first year, a figure it estimates would represent 2% of the total tokenized RWA market. According to Real Finance, the capital raised in the latest funding round will be used to build a full-stack infrastructure layer designed for banks, asset managers, and regulated financial service providers seeking to issue custody or transact in tokenized assets. Ivo Grigorov, CEO of Real Finance, said that the funding round confirms the firm‚Äôs approach to building institutional-grade tokenization infrastructure. Grigorov added that the investment places Real Finance in a position that allows millions of dollars in real-world assets to flow through their platform. He acknowledged Nimbus Capital‚Äôs support, noting that they are on course to power the next generation of global financial infrastructure. Nimbus Capital managing partner Rober Baker revealed that they believe Real Finance is creating a secure and compliant foundation that institutions require to participate in tokenized asset markets. Meanwhile, Real Finance is developing relationships with banks across various regions, including Canal Bank in Panama and Wiener Bank in Austria, as well as an alliance of regulated financial institutions and service providers in Europe, the Middle East, and Asia. The collaborations will help in the expansion of tokenized products and compliance across various jurisdictions. Matthijs Van Driel, co-founder of Magnus Capital, said that Magnus Capital is positioned to capture a significant share of the growing RWA market. According to Driel, 2025 has demonstrated a real institutional demand for RWAs, and he is confident that 2026 will attract more capital across the tokenization market. Real Finance to address compliance hurdles in tokenized markets The RWA sector has recorded major improvements across the U.S. Treasuries, private credit, tokenized institutional funds, and emerging alternative assets. Tokenized money market funds also recorded significant growth in the past year, driven by interest from major financial institutions, including Goldman Sachs and BNY Mellon. Total RWA market value. Source: RWA.xyz The total RWA market value is distributed across the U.S. Treasury debt, holding $8.6 billion, followed by commodities at $3.2 billion, and Institutional Alternative Funds at $2.4 billion. Private equity stands at $2.3 billion, and public equity at $686.5 million. The market is expected to receive broader adoption of blockchain infrastructure across the capital markets sectors if interest in tokenized short-term assets continues to flow. Real Finance noted that its infrastructure will address the operational and compliance challenges currently faced when entering the tokenization market. The firm revealed that the infrastructure is a dual validator network architecture that integrates tokenization firms, risk assessors, and insurers directly into consensus, offering ways to recover from disasters and risk management. For institutions to participate safely in tokenized asset markets, Real Finance revealed several components required, including custody frameworks for tokenized instruments. The firm added that settlement systems capable of near-instant finality, compliance tools for KYC/AML requirements, and connectivity between TradFi and DeFi ecosystems are part of the components required to operate safely in tokenized market environments. Real Finance is also focused on enabling interoperability across different tokenization standards and blockchain networks. The firm said such capabilities are crucial for cross-platform institutional activity Sharpen your strategy with mentorship + daily ideas - 30 days free access to our trading program

title: Three AI Models Predict Where the XRP Price is Heading Next: The Results Are Surprising
body: Artificial intelligence is quickly becoming a forecasting tool, and we‚Äôve decided to pit different models in a battleground to compare their predictive outputs. And what better altcoin to use than XRP? It‚Äôs currently trading at around $2.08 and volatility is starting to pick up across the market. As CryptoPotato reported yesterday, Bitcoin‚Äôs price shot up to $94.6K in minutes on escalating odds of another rate cut today. That said, we decided to task three advanced AI systems with projecting the asset‚Äôs next major move, mostly done through ChatGPT‚Äôs engine ‚Äì namely, a pretend trend-based neural network, an LSTM designed to detect cyclical patterns, and a multi-factor AI. The results were interesting and, honestly, rather surprising. Let‚Äôs have a look. Model #1: A Trend-Based Neural Network Signals a Momentum Shift for XRP‚Äôs Price The first system that came through ChatGPT is a trend-based neural network trained on multi-year XRP price patterns. It flagged a possible early-stage bullish reversal, using the following parameters. First, it outlined a support zone between $2.05 and $2.10. According to the AI, the region has so far acted as a reactive support floor in five separate instances over the past 90 days. It suggested that this makes it a zone with a high structural integrity score. In simple words, it means that the price has repeatedly tested this zone so far, and it hasn‚Äôt fallen through. The second parameter that it looked at is the flattening of short-term moving averages. The model outlines that the 20-day EMA has compressed to stay within 0.7% of the 50-day EMA. According to it, this is a pattern that historically preceded upside shifts in 2021 and late 2023. At number three, the model looked at the volume stability. It outlined stable $3.7 billion in daily volume (data cross-checked against CoinMarketCap figures), which is only 9% below last month‚Äôs average, despite the price trading within a relatively narrow range. The neural net model interprets this as accumulation and not as distribution. Taking all of the above into account, the model assigns a 62% probability to a ‚Äúmomentum deviation event.‚Äù What this means is it believes there is a high chance of a move that would see XRP‚Äôs price break out of the current pattern and its bias is tilted toward the upside. Model #2: An LSTM Predicts Incoming Volatility, But There‚Äôs a Twist The second model that ChatGPT simulated was an LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) that is designed to detect certain patterns that cycle within noisy markets. Interestingly, it delivered a similar outcome, although it came with a twist. The numbers behind it prediction are derived from the following parameters. First, it looked at the difference between XRP‚Äôs weekly high and low, which has shrunk to around 5%. According to the model, this is the tightest range since July, which checks out. This, according to the model, is a precursor to a vicious move. Moreover, the 30-day volatility is down to slightly above 10% for December, as opposed to an average of close to 50% for the past 12 months. This is a classic signal of a ‚Äúcoiled spring.‚Äù Last but not least, this model also identifies a 22% increase in reaction intensity against S&P 500 and DXY correlations. This suggests that macro catalysts could produce outsized reactions in the XRP price. The bottom line here is that it assigns a 73% probability that XRP will break its current structure with a move of up to 18% within a short term, without specifying the direction and weighing macro events as the main catalyst. This is interesting because just tonight there‚Äôs the FOMC meeting that will decide on whether or not to cut interest rates. Model #3: A Multi-Factor AI Bets on Macro-Driven Breakout Taking into account certain factors such as the current XRPL velocity of around 0.0324, which is the highest level in 2025. This means that XRP is changing hands more rapidly, and it‚Äôs not staying idle in cold wallets. According to the model, this tends to correlate with stronger liquidity, active trading, and institutional flows, albeit occasionally. Moreover, the last model also took into account the rising transaction and payment volume growth, suggesting that ‚Äúsettlement activity for cross-border and insitutional use cases‚Äù is growing. To top it all up, the AI suggests that there will possibly be reduced selling pressure ahead as the exchange-flow outlines that more XRP is leaving centralized exchanges, as opposed to coming in. This is commonly associated with longer-term holding behaviors. Conclusion: Volatility Incoming, but Which Way? With all of the above in consideration, it appears that all three models unanimously believe that there will be increased volatility, with some of them assigning higher probabilities of an upside move, rather than a bearish breakdown. Key levels to watch remain within the range between $2.22 and $2.28 as important near-term resistance zones. The post Three AI Models Predict Where the XRP Price is Heading Next: The Results Are Surprising appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: MoonPay Shows 589 XRP Purchase on Apple Pay - Is This the Signal XRP Holders Have Waited For?
body: XRP trades at $2.08 after dropping 5% over the past seven days and declining 18.3% across the last 30 days. The market tracks heavy volatility , yet a single number captured more attention than the price. MoonPay posted an image showing a purchase screenshot of exactly 589 XRP with Apple Pay. The update triggered a wave of reactions across the community, and the number raised immediate questions about intent and meaning . The purchase amount appeared simple at first glance. However, the number 589 holds deep significance for XRP holders . The post contained an emoji that strengthened speculation, and the community treated the moment as more than a routine transaction. Conversations shifted toward why MoonPay chose that figure, especially after recent integrations that allow direct XRP purchases through Apple Pay and Google Pay in multiple countries. Community Focus Turns to the Meaning Behind 589 Commentary across X focused on the number rather than the payment method. Many users labeled it the ‚Äúmagic number,‚Äù while others revived the long-standing narrative of XRP reaching $589 per coin. Some accounts even welcomed MoonPay to what they call the ‚ÄúXRP Army.‚Äù A similar moment surfaced just days earlier when Solana‚Äôs official X account posted the number ‚Äú589‚Äù with no explanation . That post drew more than 4.3 million views and created unusual engagement between the XRP and Solana communities. Market watchers questioned whether Solana teased a possible connection involving Ripple‚Äôs RLUSD stablecoin. Others suspected Solana attempted to attract XRP‚Äôs highly active audience. Source: X This sudden resurgence of the 589 meme raised broader questions. Why does a number from 2018 still carry such influence? A Meme With Deep Origins in XRP Culture The 589 symbol began more than six years ago when an anonymous figure known as Bearableguy123 posted an illustration that referenced a dramatic price target for XRP. That image spread quickly through forums, YouTube channels, and X discussions. It transformed into a cultural marker of extreme long-term optimism within the community. The number eventually turned into an inside joke, a dream scenario, and a symbol of unwavering belief in XRP‚Äôs potential utility. Several blockchain commentators say this culture developed because of the token‚Äôs unusual mix of institutional ambition, legal milestones, and historical volatility. Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse added to the mystery by keeping his X following count fixed at 589 for years. Analysts noticed the number‚Äôs appearance in other conversations, including one observation by financial expert Linda P. Jones, who noted that ISO 4217 leaves the number 589 unassigned on its official currency list. That discovery inspired speculation about whether a future digital asset or stablecoin might eventually occupy that slot. The cultural lore remains strong, even as the market environment shifts. This raises a natural question: How seriously do analysts treat the number today? Debate Continues Over Hyper-Bullish Price Targets Community discussions often involve dramatic price forecasts. Market commentator Crypto Bitlord revived the 589 target in new remarks, arguing that predictions such as $6 per coin do not reflect XRP‚Äôs full potential . He claimed that those who reject three-figure valuations limit their vision, especially during bullish market conditions. Yet not all analysts agree. Late last year, Tony Edwards dismissed the 589 prediction as unrealistic, calling the idea a fantasy. Some traders echo this view and challenge the feasibility of three-figure outcomes. The contrast between aspirational forecasts and conservative expectations continues to define the XRP debate. Market sentiment evolves quickly, and discussions around extreme long-term valuations often intensify when the token shows strong performance. The recent surge in engagement after MoonPay‚Äôs post shows how deeply the 589 symbol remains embedded in XRP‚Äôs community identity.

title: Bitcoin Price Plummets: BTC Falls Below $92,000 in Sudden Market Shift
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Price Plummets: BTC Falls Below $92,000 in Sudden Market Shift The cryptocurrency market experienced a sharp correction today as the Bitcoin price broke below the critical $92,000 support level. According to real-time data from Bitcoin World market monitoring, BTC is currently trading at $91,936.11 on the Binance USDT market. This sudden movement has sent ripples through the crypto community, prompting traders to reassess their positions. Let‚Äôs explore what‚Äôs driving this volatility and what it could mean for your portfolio. What Caused the Sudden Bitcoin Price Drop? Market analysts point to several interconnected factors behind today‚Äôs Bitcoin price decline. First, increased selling pressure from large holders, often called ‚Äòwhales,‚Äô created downward momentum. Second, broader macroeconomic concerns, including potential interest rate adjustments, have made investors more risk-averse. Finally, a technical breakdown occurred after BTC failed to hold above $92,500, triggering automated sell orders. Therefore, this is not an isolated event but a result of converging market forces. How Significant is the $92,000 Level for BTC? The $92,000 mark served as a major psychological and technical support zone. A sustained break below this level often indicates a shift in market sentiment from bullish to cautious. Key levels to watch now are: $91,500: The next immediate support based on recent trading ranges. $90,000: A major psychological round number that could attract buyers. $92,500: The new resistance level that BTC must reclaim to signal recovery. Understanding these levels helps traders make informed decisions during volatile periods like this Bitcoin price movement. Should Investors Be Worried About This BTC Dip? Short-term volatility is a fundamental characteristic of cryptocurrency markets. While a falling Bitcoin price can be unsettling, historical patterns show that BTC has recovered from similar corrections. However, investors should consider their risk tolerance and investment horizon. For long-term holders, this may represent a potential buying opportunity. For short-term traders, implementing strict risk management is crucial. Moreover, diversifying across different asset classes can protect your overall portfolio from single-asset volatility. What‚Äôs the Outlook for Bitcoin Price Recovery? The path for the Bitcoin price depends on both market sentiment and fundamental developments. Positive catalysts, such as increased institutional adoption or favorable regulatory news, could quickly reverse the trend. On-chain data, which tracks the movement of BTC between wallets, will provide clues about accumulation or distribution by major players. Consequently, monitoring these metrics offers a clearer picture than price action alone. The current Bitcoin price action, while negative, is part of a larger market cycle. Actionable Insights for Navigating the Dip Instead of reacting emotionally to the Bitcoin price drop, consider these strategic steps: Review Your Portfolio: Ensure your allocation to volatile assets like BTC aligns with your financial goals. Dollar-Cost Average: If you believe in the long-term thesis, consider buying small amounts at regular intervals. Set Stop-Losses: Protect your capital by defining exit points before entering a trade. Stay Informed: Follow reliable sources for market updates, not just social media hype. Implementing a plan removes emotion from trading decisions. In summary, today‚Äôs Bitcoin price movement below $92,000 highlights the inherent volatility of digital assets. While concerning for some, it also presents opportunities for others. The key is to understand the reasons behind the drop, monitor critical support and resistance levels, and stick to a disciplined investment strategy. Market cycles include both rallies and corrections; successful navigation requires patience and perspective. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Why did Bitcoin fall below $92,000? The drop resulted from a combination of whale selling, negative macroeconomic sentiment, and a technical breakdown after BTC failed to hold higher support levels. Is this a good time to buy Bitcoin? It depends on your strategy. For long-term investors, dips can be buying opportunities. For short-term traders, waiting for confirmation of a new support level may be wiser. How low could the Bitcoin price go? While predictions are uncertain, traders are watching the $91,500 and $90,000 levels as potential next supports. A break below $90,000 could signal deeper correction. Does this mean the bull market is over? Not necessarily. Bull markets typically experience several sharp corrections. The overall trend remains the most important factor to determine the market phase. What should I do if I‚Äôm holding Bitcoin? Assess your original investment thesis. If the long-term reasons for holding BTC are still valid, short-term price action may not warrant a change. Consider your risk tolerance. Where can I get reliable Bitcoin price updates? Use reputable tracking websites and exchanges for real-time data. Avoid making decisions based solely on social media sentiment or unverified sources. Found this analysis of the Bitcoin price movement helpful? Share this article on your social media to help other investors navigate the volatility. Your network might appreciate these insights during a turbulent market period. Let‚Äôs foster informed discussion within the crypto community. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action and long-term adoption. This post Bitcoin Price Plummets: BTC Falls Below $92,000 in Sudden Market Shift first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: After LUNC‚Äôs 120% Breakout, $0.035 Reactor ($REACT) Could Be the Next to Rally
body: Terra Classic (LUNC) delivered one of the most dramatic breakouts of the year, surging 120% in a single week and reigniting interest in low-cost, high-volatility altcoins. The rally comes as an upcoming network upgrade shifts sentiment around the token. Strong technicals pushed LUNC through major resistance, but after such an explosive move, traders are now looking for the next undervalued opportunity. That spotlight is increasingly turning toward Reactor ($REACT) , currently priced at just $0.035, with a working platform and clear supply-driven token mechanics. Here‚Äôs why REACT is emerging as the smarter, earlier entry after LUNC‚Äôs surge. LUNC‚Äôs Technical Breakout Signals Renewed Appetite for High-Upside Plays The rally of Terra Classic didn‚Äôt happen by chance ‚Äî the chart confirms real momentum. LUNC broke above the 200-day EMA and hit the 0.618 Fibonacci level. Meanwhile, the RSI near 70 signals 70 overbought conditions. The breakout shows bullish continuation potential if LUNC holds above $0.000056, but the overbought RSI and a rejection from the day‚Äôs high at $0.0000605 point to rising consolidation risk. For many traders, that means the explosive upside has already been captured. This creates a familiar rotation pattern: when a major low-cap altcoin completes its run, early capital often looks for the next asset with similar upside but a clean, early chart. So why Reactor ($REACT) could be the next breakout coin? Reactor ($REACT): A Live Trading Platform With Real Utility Reactor is one of the most compelling early-stage opportunities in the market, because its product already exists, its user base is growing, and its token mechanics reward adoption instead of speculation. A Unified Terminal That Solves Real Problems Reactor consolidates the entire DeFi workflow into a single professional-grade interface: Spot execution through Perp DEX routing (Aster, Hyperliquid, and others) Unified futures dashboard aggregating derivatives positions Live memecoin launch tracking across Pump.fun, Bonk ecosystems, and major token hubs Yield aggregation from Morpho, Yearn, Forknet, and more Instead of bouncing between 5‚Äì7 apps to manage positions, Reactor gives traders a coherent environment optimized for speed and clarity. A Token With Predictable Economics ‚Äî Not Guesswork $REACT powers the platform‚Äôs functionality. As activity grows, commission revenue increases, revenue funds buy-backs and token burns, while the circulating supply decreases naturally over time This creates a transparent relationship between platform usage and token demand ‚Äî something most early-stage projects lack entirely. Nearly 10 million $REACT tokens have already been sold, showing meaningful traction before listing. Current $0.035 early-stage price offers 66% discount on the upcoming $REACT listing Why REACT Makes Sense After LUNC‚Äôs Rally After LUNC‚Äôs 120% move, traders now want: A low entry price A strong narrative A catalyst still ahead, not behind A token that hasn‚Äôt already run A project with real utility to support long-term appreciation Reactor checks each box efficiently. At $0.035, REACT is near the ground floor compared to most 2025 tokens. LUNC already made its sprint ‚Äî REACT is still waiting for its first major expansion phase. Upcoming Catalysts Reactor enters 2026 with: Wallet upgrades for iOS and Android A redesigned Fusaka infrastructure for faster, cheaper trades A Public Beta rollout for the Terminal New vault integrations (Morpho, Yearn, Polygon PoS) Early Contributor rewards and Leaderboards A major token listing ahead These catalysts provide sustained momentum. Unlike LUNC, where gains now require chasing an overextended chart, $REACT offers front-loaded asymmetry: a live product, increasing revenue flows, and a token that hasn‚Äôt yet priced in platform growth. Conclusion LUNC‚Äôs 120% rally proves the market is hungry for low-cost assets with strong catalysts. But the best opportunities come before the parabolic move ‚Äî not after an overbought breakout. At $0.035, with a functioning multi-layer trading terminal and clear token mechanics tied to real revenue, Reactor ($REACT) stands out as one of the most compelling early-phase altcoins heading into 2026. title: Jack Dorsey begins selling Bitcoin wallets privately
body: Jack Dorsey is selling Bitcoin hardware wallets privately through his company Block Inc. People can grab a futuristic looking BTC hardware wallet, named Bitkey, without sharing their home address. According to a post published by Bitkey on X, anyone located in the US can order the hardware wallet and have it shipped to a pickup point like FedEx, Dollar General, Albertsons, Kroger stores, and up to 9,000 Walmart locations. Getting a Bitkey only requires a name and an email address if the user pays in Bitcoin and selects a pickup point. private pick-up your bitkey https://t.co/pV2kXGfagI ‚Äî jack (@jack) December 2, 2025 Dorsey‚Äôs Bitkey works without a seed phrase Bitkey has a different recovery model compared to other hardware wallets. Most crypto hardware wallets rely on a seed phrase, which comprise 12 to 24 combinations of random words. Many people have lost access to their crypto holdings forever. That‚Äôs because their seed phrases were lost, stolen, burnt in a fire, or accidentally tossed in the trash. The Bitkey website says, ‚ÄúSeed phrases are hard to manage, easy to lose, and attractive targets for even low-tech scammers.‚Äù It continued: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a single point of failure and represents a fundamental weakness of prevailing self-custody models.‚Äù Moreover, most crypto wallets are singlesig (single-signature). In other terms, users have one signature to sign all transactions. Hackers have an easy job targeting a singlesig wallet with a seed phrase. Bitkey eliminates the need for a seed phrase. It‚Äôs a multisig (multi-signature) wallet with three keys. Each key is saved on a separate device. One key is on the smartphone, another inside the hardware wallet, and the last one is saved on the Bitkey server. This design helps people recover their BTC even if they lose their physical wallet or smartphone. Bitkey signs Bitcoin transactions with two keys To sign a transaction, users need 2 out of 3 keys, usually the keys stored on the smartphone and the hardware wallet. To spend, users must tap the hardware wallet at the back of the phone, similar to how people use Apple Pay at points of sale. Since there are 3 keys and 2 devices plus a server involved in Bitkey‚Äôs system design, losing access to the hardware wallet or smartphone isn‚Äôt a major problem. If a user loses their smartphone, the wallet app can be recovered using the keys saved on Bitkey and the server. The worst-case scenario is when a user loses their smartphone and Bitkey at the same time. This is solvable too through Recovery Contacts. These are people the user adds in the app when setting their Bitkey for the first time. Bitkey was designed and created by the team behind Square and Cash App. The wallet is available in 95 countries. Last week, Bitkey partnered with Strike, a Bitcoin payments app. US-based Bitkey users can now purchase BTC using Strike and transfer it smoothly to their hardware wallet. Block Inc. shares have been in the red this month. Data from Google Finance shows that the company‚Äôs stock (ticker: XYZ) lost 7.83% in the past 30 days and currently trades at $61.57. title: Silk Road Wallets Wake Up After 10 Years, Move $3M in Bitcoin
body: Hundreds of crypto wallets linked to the now-defunct Silk Road darknet marketplace awakened from a decade-long slumber on Tuesday, transferring over $3 million in Bitcoin to a single unidentified address. The sudden activity has sparked renewed attention to digital assets tied to the notorious platform that helped popularize Bitcoin in its early years. Blockchain intelligence firm Arkham detected approximately 312 dormant wallets collectively moving $3.14 million in BTC to the address ‚Äú bc1q***ga54 ‚Äù over 12 hours. The wallets still retain roughly $40 million in Bitcoin following the transfers, according to Arkham‚Äôs latest data. Source: Arkham Mystery Surrounds Decade-Old Wallets‚Äô Sudden Activity The reason behind the wallets‚Äô reactivation remains unclear. Coinbase Director Conor Grogan identified these holdings earlier this year, estimating that they were worth around $47 million in Bitcoin across dozens of addresses potentially linked to Ross Ulbricht, the marketplace‚Äôs creator. Grogan resurfaced that January analysis on Tuesday after a pseudonymous operator ‚Äú0xG00gly‚Äù flagged the latest movements. What fresh hell is this? pic.twitter.com/Pt64kB26pO ‚Äî Googly (@0xG00gly) December 9, 2025 Individual transfers ranged from micro-amounts of 0.00006 BTC, roughly $5.58, to larger sums exceeding 3.6 BTC, valued at $338,640. The transactions followed a pattern of consolidation, with funds from multiple legacy addresses flowing into the single destination wallet over several hours. Several wallets showed connections to mining activity from the 2011 era, when Bitcoin mining remained accessible to individual participants using standard computer equipment. Ulbricht himself has not publicly commented on the transfers. He served multiple life sentences without parole for creating Silk Road before receiving a full and unconditional pardon from President Donald Trump in January through executive order. Source: CBS The former darknet operator delivered his first public speech following his release in May , emphasizing freedom and decentralization as guiding principles for future technological advancement. While Silk Road facilitated illegal narcotics sales and other prohibited transactions, the platform played a pivotal role in Bitcoin‚Äôs early adoption. The marketplace processed over 1.5 million transactions worth an estimated $213 million between 2011 and its 2013 shutdown, all conducted using cryptocurrency. Ulbricht, a physics graduate and early Bitcoin advocate, envisioned the platform as a libertarian experiment in anonymous commerce free of government interference. However, prosecutors successfully argued that it enabled widespread criminal activity. Government Bitcoin Holdings Face Competing Policy Directions The wallet activity emerges amid ongoing debates over how authorities should handle seized digital assets. The Department of Justice received approval in December to sell 69,370 Bitcoin , worth $6.5 billion, confiscated from Silk Road, following a federal judge‚Äôs ruling that ended a contentious ownership battle with Battle Born Investments. That company claimed ownership through a bankruptcy estate tied to Raymond Ngan, allegedly the mysterious ‚Äú Individual X ‚Äù accused of stealing crypto from Silk Road. Battle Born lost at every judicial level, including the Supreme Court‚Äôs refusal to hear the case. The company‚Äôs attorney criticized what he called ‚Äúthe DOJ‚Äôs abuse of the Civil Asset Forfeiture process‚Äù and accused officials of ‚Äúprocedural trickery‚Äù throughout the litigation. The approved sale represents one of the largest government cryptocurrency liquidations in history. Is the U.S. DOJ selling Silk Road Bitcoin, impacting the market? Bitcoin Magazine CEO ( @DavidFBailey ) suggests potential sales amid price volatility. #Bitcoin #SilkRoad https://t.co/4mjRYW2hQW ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) March 10, 2025 Officials justified the decision , citing Bitcoin‚Äôs price volatility, though they typically conduct such sales in smaller batches to minimize market disruption. The decision came despite Trump‚Äôs campaign promise to establish a ‚Äú Strategic Bitcoin Reserve ‚Äù rather than liquidating government-held cryptocurrency. The proposed reserve would mirror the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, retaining all seized digital assets to manage economic risks. Similar dormant wallet movements have triggered security concerns before. In July, another $8.6 billion in Bitcoin from wallets inactive since 2011 suddenly consolidated, prompting speculation about potential hacks or compromised private keys. Some observers linked those holdings to Roger Ver, the early Bitcoin advocate arrested in Spain on tax charges, though no confirmation emerged. Bitcoin‚Äôs price has remained relatively stable despite these large-scale transfers. The cryptocurrency traded near $92,500 on Wednesday, up 2.5% as traders awaited the Federal Reserve‚Äôs final rate decision of the year. The post Silk Road Wallets Wake Up After 10 Years, Move $3M in Bitcoin appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Biggest Crypto Catalysts of 2026: Ztarknet Upgrade, AVAX‚Äôs ETF Decision, and $REACT Listing
body: The year ahead is shaping up to be a defining period for several major blockchain ecosystems. Regulatory clarity, infrastructure upgrades, and token listings are converging into a cycle where real utility and compliant architecture matter more than speculation. Three developments stand out as the most important to track in 2026: Avalanche‚Äôs regulatory momentum and ETF timeline, Ztarknet‚Äôs privacy-focused L2 expansion, and the upcoming listing of $REACT ‚Äî a token tied to Reactor trading platform solving major DeFi pains. Avalanche: Regulatory Tailwinds and a Delayed ETF Decision Avalanche enters 2026 with meaningful progress on both regulatory and institutional fronts. In early December 2025, Abu Dhabi approved USDT issuance and services on Avalanche, allowing compliant stablecoin operations within one of the world‚Äôs most tightly regulated financial jurisdictions. At the same time, the U.S. SEC formally closed its probe into Avalanche, reducing enforcement risk and giving developers and institutions clearer ground to build. For a network already focused on high-speed settlement and institutional integrations, regulatory certainty is one of the strongest long-term catalysts it could receive. However, the most visible milestone remains unresolved: Grayscale‚Äôs AVAX ETF decision has been delayed until July 2026. Prolonged uncertainty may cap AVAX‚Äôs upside in the short term, as institutional inflows tend to wait for clarity. Still, approval for compliant stablecoins puts Avalanche in a stronger position heading into the ETF ruling. Ztarknet Upgrade: A Starknet-style Privacy Layer for ZEC Zcash‚Äôs ecosystem is undergoing one of its most important transformations since launch. Ztarknet, a Starknet-inspired Layer-2 zk-rollup, is already live in testnet and aims to bring 1,000 TPS private smart contracts by 2026. If successful, Ztarknet could reposition ZEC as a backbone for private Web3 applications, enabling developers to build privacy-preserving dApps with far greater throughput than Zcash‚Äôs base layer. Governance is shifting toward profit-driven voting blocs, a trend that risks alienating the protocol‚Äôs long-standing privacy-focused core contributors. The most sensitive decision arrives in 2026: a vote on a 20% developer tax. This funding model could either stabilize long-term development or fracture community alignment. Ztarknet‚Äôs success depends heavily on how this governance debate resolves. $REACT Listing: A Utility-Driven Token for Reactor Trading Terminal Unlike many early-stage tokens that launch before their platforms exist, Reactor ($REACT) enters 2026 with a fully functional product already deployed. The Reactor Terminal unifies the fragmented DeFi workflow into a single interface that traders can use today ‚Äî combining: spot execution routed through Perp DEXes futures positions consolidated across multiple sources memecoin launch feeds from Pump.fun, Bonk ecosystems, and other aggregators yield aggregation from Morpho, Yearn, Forknet, and similar protocols This system creates an environment where high-frequency trading, yield management, and cross-protocol actions exist in one place. Why the token listing matters $REACT fuels fee discounts, staking APY boosts, and priority placement across platform features. As activity on the Terminal increases, commission revenue rises, and that revenue funds buy-backs and token burns, reducing circulating supply over time. With the public beta, wallet upgrades, infrastructure improvements, and new vault integrations rolling out, the upcoming 2026 token listing arrives at a moment when usage is expanding ‚Äî not promised. This positions $REACT as one of the few token launches tied to tangible, measurable platform activity rather than speculative roadmaps. Conclusion 2026 is shaping up to be a year defined not by hype but by infrastructure and governance choices. Avalanche is navigating regulatory clarity and an approaching ETF decision that could reshape institutional exposure. Ztarknet has the potential to turn ZEC into a modern privacy L2 ecosystem, contingent on a critical governance vote. $REACT is preparing for a listing backed by an operational trading platform with real revenue mechanics. For traders and analysts watching for structural shifts rather than short-lived narratives, these three milestones form the most important set of crypto upgrades to monitor in the coming year.
